survey_name: Online Professional Certification Platform User Survey
survey_brief: Collect feedback from users of online professional certification platforms to improve course offerings, platform usability, and learning outcomes.

questions.question_text: How did you first become aware of this professional certification platform?
questions.client_notes: Use randomized answer order to reduce bias. Consider adding 'Other' option if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with single selection. Include 'Prefer not to answer' opt-out.

script.question_text: How did you first become aware of this professional certification platform?

questions.question_text: Which of the following platform features have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Limit to 8 options max for mobile responsiveness. Use checkbox grid layout.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-select checkboxes with 'None of the above' option.

script.question_text: Which of the following platform features have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you access the platform?
questions.client_notes: Use balanced frequency ranges. Include explicit time references.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with vertical layout. Add 'Not applicable' option.

script.question_text: How often do you access the platform?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the relevance of course content to your professional needs?
questions.client_notes: Use standard 5-point Likert scale. Ensure neutral midpoint.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with smiley-face icons for visual scale.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the relevance of course content to your professional needs?

questions.question_text: What technical challenges have you experienced? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include concrete technical issues. Randomize option order.

script.question_text: What technical challenges have you experienced? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this platform to colleagues?
questions.client_notes: Standard NPS precursor question. Use numeric scale 0-10 if preferred.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with numbered scale alternative.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this platform to colleagues?

questions.question_text: What specific improvements would increase the value of your certification experience?
questions.client_notes: Use text box with 500-character limit. Example prompts improve response quality.
questions.scripter_notes: Open text field with input validation.

script.question_text: What specific improvements would increase the value of your certification experience?

questions.question_text: Which learning formats do you prefer for skill development? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use ranking question alternative if prioritization is needed.

script.question_text: Which learning formats do you prefer for skill development? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the cost-value relationship of the subscription plans?
questions.client_notes: Include pricing reference points if available. Anchor scale clearly.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with currency symbols if applicable.

script.question_text: How would you rate the cost-value relationship of the subscription plans?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments about your certification journey:
questions.client_notes: Use optional field to reduce abandonment risk. Provide text examples.
questions.scripter_notes: Open text area with save draft functionality.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments about your certification journey:
